metadata.title: CVE-2024-25715 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Glewlwyd SSO server 2.x through 2.7.6 allows open redirection viaredirect_uri.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25715` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-glewlwyd - 1.3.1-1
glewlwyd - 1.3.1-1
glewlwyd-common - 1.3.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: glewlwyd package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-1').
